item.description:
Greetings, meditators! You are always welcome to the Kriya mediation class each week as we gather for guided meditation and sit in sacred silence. I also thought you would like this other class I'm offering to raise our vibrations through RYSE. RYSE (Realizing Your Sublime Energies) is a group clearing meant to bring in high vibration, light and healing for your energy system, body, and consciousness. I hope to see you!
Here's the details:
RYSE energy clearing with Judy!
Tuesday, Dec. 14; $20 walk-in 7:00-8:30 p.m.

RYSE is a group energy clearing focusing on the chakras, aura, male/female balance and more. RYSE brings about your next level of harmony, health, clarity, creativity and wholeness. A mini talk before the clearing will let you know how the clearing works. Experience the difference when your energy systems are clear! People always feel great long after this deep clearing. It's so peaceful! To learn about more offerings at A Higher Balance go to www.AHigherBalance.com
Judy is a Level 4 RYSE pracitioner.

..
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at center of the building and take stairs or elevator to 2nd floor.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: RYSE energy clearing - great for meditators!
